context: What do I need to purchase in order to charge the Gembonics portable charger?
response: The Gembonics charger comes with a 3-in-1 cable which includes micro USB port so you just use that to charge it. You can connect it to the computer for a USB wall outlet. you dont need to buy anything else :)

context: are the keys themselves illuminated? does the actual letters light up or is it just backlight around the keys? just making sure
response: There is illumination but so faint in blue, I could not see the keys well.   Had to return.  not sure if the one I got was defective or just overly faint design.   either way for regular user it was defective.

context: does it have english audio (i.e Character phrases)
response: No this is a full japanese titled game.audio in english is not available.However parts of the menu are written in english and japanese but thats as far as you get when you are looking for things in english

context: does "2-pack set" mean 2 or 4 analog sticks? How many come in one order?

context: Like the WoW cata mmo gaming mouse, is the sarface of the mouse going to start rubbing away?
response: Which surface are you talking about? The outer surface where you rest your hand? I imagine with enough time it would. I have only had mine a few months, and have never used or touched the other one. Seems pretty sturdy so far.

context: whats the differ in fighter and combat stick?
response: no much mate... the botton in the thumb is the more visible (2 hats more)... for price, had an easy deccision !!!! Good Luck

context: Looks like just what I need! But why does it come with a USB cable? It doesn't seem as if it would need one.
response: The controller needs a software update In order to work with the new adapter, hence the usb.

context: Is this joystick compatible with Windows 8/8.1?
response: According to 'mypilotstore.com' the CH Flightstick Pro is compatible with Windows 8, but was  not inclusive to 8.1.  It probably is.  Thanks, Ron K

context: Do games play offline, or do I have to be online to play?  Will they work with Win Vista Home Premium 64-bit edition?
response: All games play offline, quite a variety of games too. Easy to learn and play. I am using Windows 7, but I am pretty sure they will work with Vista Home Premium.
